headline: Keysight (KEYS) and Spirent Postpone Deal Deadline To October 27
summary: Keysight Technologies, Inc. (NYSE:KEYS) is one of the best smart city stocks. On September 16, Keysight Technologies and Spirent Communications confirmed that the UK Court has agreed to extend the acquisition deadline by nearly a month, resetting it to October 27, 2025. The extension pertains to Keysight’s recommended cash offer for Spirent, announced on March […]

headline: Can Cadence's Strong Free Cash Flow Keep Fueling Shareholder Returns?
summary: CDNS posts strong free cash flow and rising revenues, fueling robust buybacks as AI and semiconductor demand drive growth.

headline: InstrumentiX secures Keysight Technologies investment to advance trading infrastructure monitoring worldwide
summary: Collaboration strengthens an existing partnership, combining InstrumentiX analytics with Keysight’s global distribution and support presence and complementary visibility technologies to deliver integrated solutions for financial institutions Steve Hicks Founder and Chief Technology Officer at InstrumentiX. headline: Spotting Winners: Keysight (NYSE:KEYS) And Inspection Instruments Stocks In Q2
summary: Quarterly earnings results are a good time to check in on a company’s progress, especially compared to its peers in the same sector. Today we are looking at Keysight (NYSE:KEYS) and the best and worst performers in the inspection instruments industry.
